https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kBruQKlbvUMpYgTq4JulDqHaQwv.jpg Samy and Karuna grow up together in the slums of Royapuram. One day, they witness the brutal murder of their teacher by a gangster. While Karuna manages to kill the gangster, Samy tells to the cops that Karuna was responsible for the murder. Drohi
